summary: REQ-2 and REQ-3 appear implemented by updating the branding config and favicon link to the new logo path. REQ-1 is not evidenced as completed because no new logo asset file was added under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` in the provided diff summary. Additional unrequested changes include modifications to `project_state.json` and `frontend-file-summaries.txt`.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the uploaded new logo as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and standardize it to a square 512Ã—512 PNG for consistent rendering.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no files added, and there is no evidence of a new PNG being created under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`. Only references to the expected path were updated.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated `project_state.json` to include new_feature_requests entries (AR-1..AR-4) and statuses.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of the BuildRequest requirements (logo asset addition, branding path update, favicon update).
Not requested by the BuildRequest and unrelated to replacing logo asset/config/favicon.
